name: Stylishier Firebug status icon
description:
Modification for Firebug (https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/1843) status bar icon. Icon is based on Safari bug report to best suit the GrApple (http://www.takebacktheweb.org/) themes.

Checked with Firebug 1.4 beta.  It may or may not work with prior versions.

2009.06.16: FIXED some spacing. [87]
2009.06.12: NEW original icons; lit the bug on fire;-)  Fixed some code. [77]
2009.03.20: Initial release.
